event.title: Clock
event.name: Cycles
event.description: The number of core clock cycles

event.title: Cache
event.name: Instruction refill
event.description: Instruction fetch that causes a refill of at least the level of instruction or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Inst TLB refill
event.description: Instruction fetch that causes a TLB refill of at least the level of TLB closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data refill
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a refill of at least the level of data or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data access
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a cache access to at least the level of data or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data TLB refill
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a TLB refill of at least the level of TLB closest to the processor

event.title: Instruction
event.name: CONTEXTIDR
event.description: Instruction that writes to the CONTEXTIDR architecturally executed

event.title: Branch
event.name: Potential prediction
event.description: Branch or other change in program flow that could have been predicted by the branch prediction resources of the processor

event.title: Memory
event.name: Translation table
event.description: Write to translation table base architecturally executed

event.title: Cache
event.name: L2 data clean
event.description: Level 2 data cache Write-Back - Cleaning and coherency

event.title: Intrinsic
event.name: STREX fail
event.description: Exclusive instruction speculatively executed - STREX fail

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Load/Store
event.description: Instruction speculatively executed - Load or store

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Integer
event.description: Instruction speculatively executed - Integer data processing

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Software change
event.description: Instruction speculatively executed - Software change of the PC

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Stalled Linefill
event.description: Instruction side stalled due to a Linefill

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Stalled Page Table Walk
event.description: Instruction Side stalled due to a Page Table Walk

event.title: Cache
event.name: 4 Ways Read
event.description: Number of set of 4 ways read in the instruction cache - Tag RAM

event.title: Cache
event.name: Ways Read
event.description: Number of ways read in the instruction cache - Data RAM

event.title: Cache
event.name: BATC Read
event.description: Number of ways read in the instruction BTAC RAM

event.title: Memory
event.name: Snoop
event.description: Data snooped from other processor. This event counts memory-read operations that read data from another processor within the local Cortex-A17 cluster, rather than accessing the L2 cache or issuing an external read. It increments on each transaction, rather than on each beat of data

event.title: Slots
event.name: Load-Store Unit
event.description: Duration during which all slots in the Load-Store Unit are busy

event.title: Slots
event.name: Load-Store Issue Queue
event.description: Duration during which all slots in the Load-Store Issue queue are busy

event.title: Slots
event.name: Data Processing Issue Queue
event.description: Duration during which all slots in the Data Processing issue queue are busy

event.title: Slots
event.name: Data Engine Issue Queue
event.description: Duration during which all slots in the Data Engine issue queue are busy

event.title: NEON
event.name: Flush
event.description: Number of NEON instruction which fail their condition code and lead to a flush of the DE pipe

event.title: MMU
event.name: Table Walk
event.description: Duration during which the MMU handle a Page table walk

event.title: MMU
event.name: Stage1 Table Walk
event.description: Duration during which the MMU handle a Stage1 Page table walk

event.title: MMU
event.name: Stage2 Table Walk
event.description: Duration during which the MMU handle a Stage2 Page table walk

event.title: MMU
event.name: LSU Table Walk
event.description: Duration during which the MMU handle a Page table walk requested by the Load Store Unit

event.title: MMU
event.name: Instruction Table Walk
event.description: Duration during which the MMU handle a Page table walk requested by the Instruction side

event.title: MMU
event.name: Preload Table Walk
event.description: Duration during which the MMU handle a Page table walk requested by a Preload instruction or Prefetch request

event.title: MMU
event.name: cp15 Table Walk
event.description: Duration during which the MMU handle a Page table walk requested by a cp15 operation (maintenance by MVA and VA-to-PA operation)
